Text: JCinema, do you have 'Dixieland Daimyo' [AKA 'The Jazz Daimyo'] in your collection? I've been trying to track down a copy of it with English subtitles now for almost 20 years!
I heard a lot about this film,and thanks to you I am going to it tonight.
quatermassive: All I have is a vhs rip without subtitles. Was not planning to post it, should I do it anyway?

Even a VHS copy without subs would be much very appreciated. Thanks in advance!  [But I know that a copy with subs exists somewhere out there in the world, otherwise how else could I have watched it an art-house cinema in 1993].
